repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The manuscript is of Nyāya text, a commentary on the text Tattvacintāmaṇi written by Gaṅgeśopādhyāya. The commentary named Prakāśa written by Rucidattamiśra who flourished in 16th CE.

msItem.title: Prakāśa (A commentary on Tattvacintāmaṇi)
msItem.author: Rucidatta
msItem.rubric:
(1v 1)kṛṣṇottaraccadapaṭārdhakṛtāntarālamuttāla niśvasitanunnapayodharāgraṃ iśe sphuṭāgasi vi[bhinnatanosta]notu suptaṃ ruṣā śayanasīmni [śivaṃ śivāyāḥ (folio is half broken so the letters are half legible.)] (Gap of approximately 26 letters as folio is broken at the right side.)
(1v 2) kāśyate .
msItem.explicit: (144r 10) [ja?]ka ityāha vibhaktināmiti janayateti yadyapyānaya (gap of approximately 3 letters due to broken folio.) te tyadhīka (gap of approximately 2 lettersdue to broken folio.) tyātvayamātrādevaika bādhyata siddho tathāpi kāryyānvittanvika?vatim (gap of a few letters due to broken folio.) myatathetyukte me (gap of 2 letters due to broken folio.) ki

support.p: Palm leaf is used as guard folio. Front guard folio has title. The upper layer at the bottom of the left side is broken.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio. 1 balnk folio half broken at the beginning and 144 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals are used in the left margin of the verso of the folio. Many folio are broken at the left margin so the numbers are damaged.
supportDesc.condition: Good state of preservation but manuscript is fragile. Broken folio at the margins and edges.

handNote.desc: Good hand, sometimes the shape of cluster syllables is unclear.

additions.desc: front Palm leaf guard folio has title written at the centre Cintāmaṇivyākhyānaṃ rucidattiyaṃ. One line belo written in Granth.

listBibl.bibl: Tattvacintāmaṇi of Gaṅgeśopādhyāya Prakāśa of Rucidattamiśra and Nyāyaśikāmaṇi on Prakāśa critically edited by Rāmakṛṣṇādhvarin, Kendriya Sanskrit vidyapeetha Series no. 20, 33 and 60 Published by Kendriya Sanskrit vidyapeetha Tirupati Vol-I: 1973; Vol-II part 1: 1982; Vol-II part 2: 1999.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words. square brackets are added to show if the word is not completely legible or used questionmark to show that letter is doubtful.

TEI.text:
1v 1)kṛṣṇottaraccadapaṭārdhakṛtāntarālamuttāla niśvasitanunnapayodharāgraṃ iśe sphuṭāgasi vi[bhinnatanosta]notu suptaṃ ruṣā śayanasīmni [śivaṃ śivāyāḥ (folio is half broken so the letters are half legible.)] (Gap of approximately 26 letters as folio is broken at the right side.)
(1v 2) kāśyate . prāripsitapratibandhakavighnavighātāya kṛtaṃ namaskāraṃ śiṣyaśikṣāyai nibandhāti .
(144r 10) [ja?]ka ityāha vibhaktināmiti janayateti yadyapyānaya (gap of approximately 3 letters due to broken folio.) te tyadhīka (gap of approximately 2 lettersdue to broken folio.) tyātvayamātrādevaika bādhyata siddho tathāpi kāryyānvittanvika?vatim (gap of a few letters due to broken folio.) myatathetyukte me (gap of 2 letters due to broken folio.) ki
